An anime television series was adapted and produced by OLM and Live2D Creative Studio in October 2024. ==Characters== ; : ==Media== ===Manga=== Tono to Inu was written by Rie Nishida, it initially began serialization as a short term series on Flex Comix's Comic Polaris manga website on March 18, 2021. Later, It started being serialized regularly on October 14 of that year. By October 2024, its chapters have been collected into four tankōbon volumes. ===Anime=== An anime adaptation was announced on January 25, 2024. Later, it was revealed to be a TV series. The series was produced by OLM and Live2D Creative Studio, directed by Haruki Kasugamori, and the music was composed by Shun Miyazaki. On 10 October 2024, It started airing on "Wan Wan" version of Tokyo MX. == References == ==Other websites== * * * Category:Anime series based on manga
